subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: In simplified Chinese, {{l|zh|馀}} is a non-standard form of {{lang|zh|餘}} only used as a surname or when it is desirable to distinguish {{lang|zh|餘}} from {{l|zh|余}}. <!-- Note: 馀 is not found in mainland China 通用規范漢字表 (2013) -->
